original_text: They must not touch the dead bodies of the animals from the sea or the river. They must not eat the meat from those other animals.
korean_text: 이들은 너희에게 가증한 것이니 너희는 그 고기를 먹지 말고 그 주검을 가증히 여기라

sentences.original_text: They must not touch the dead bodies of the animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 동물의 죽은 시체를 만지면 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: from the sea or the river
They must not eat the meat
